entry.title: A real network dataset analysis
entry.content: A real network dataset analysis1library(igraph) graph sample12345678#sample g <- make_graph("Zachary")plot(g,layout = layout.fruchterman.reingold, vertex.size = 10, vertex.color = V(g)$color, #vertex.label.color = NA, edge.color = grey(0.5), edge.arrow.mode = "-") 123456789#read gml (dataset : http://www-personal.umich.edu/~mejn/netdata/football.zip)gg=read_graph(file = "football.gml",format = "gml")plot(gg,layout = layout.fruchterman.reingold, vertex.size = 10, vertex.color = V(gg)$color, #vertex.label.color = NA, # edge.color = grey(0.5), edge.arrow.mode = "-") community12#com = walktrap.community(gg, steps = 5)com=cluster_walktrap(gg, weights = E(gg)$weight, steps = 4, merges = TRUE, modularity = TRUE, membership = TRUE) 123456789101112#subgroup = split(com$merges, com$membership)## subgroupV(gg)$sg = com$membership+1V(gg)$color = rainbow(max(V(gg)$sg))[V(gg)$sg]## png("net_walktrap.png", width = 500, height = 500)par(mar = c(0, 0, 0, 0))set.seed(14)plot(gg, layout = layout.fruchterman.reingold, vertex.size = 5, vertex.color = V(gg)$color, vertex.label = NA, edge.color = grey(0.5), edge.arrow.mode = "-")## dev.off()print(max(V(gg)$sg)-1) [1] 10 subgraph density1subgraph_1 = split(com$merges, com$membership) Warning message in split.default(com$merges, com$membership): “data length is not a multiple of split variable” 1subgraph_1[[8]] 20 19 4 13 82 62 141 162 207 221 35 96 27 128 143 173 172 187 223 226 1graph.density(gg) 0.0935163996948894 12sg8=subgraph(gg,V(gg)[sg==8])graph.density(sg8) Warning message in .Call("R_igraph_subgraph", graph, as.igraph.vs(graph, v) - 1, : “At structural_properties.c:1945 :igraph_subgraph is deprecated from igraph 0.6, use igraph_induced_subgraph instead” 0.727272727272727 12345678library(ggplot2)sg_d=c()for(i in (1:10)){ #sg from 2 sg_t=subgraph(gg,V(gg)[sg==(i+1)]) d=graph.density(sg_t) sg_d[i]=d} 123456data_d=data.frame(com=c(as.character(1:10)),density=sg_d)data_d$com = factor(data_d$com, levels=data_d$com)p = ggplot(data_d, aes(x=com, y=density, fill=com,group=factor(1))) +geom_bar(stat="identity", width=0.5, position=position_dodge(0.6)) + #值越大越离得远 geom_text(aes(label = com, vjust = -0.8, hjust = 0.5, color = com), show.legend = FALSE)#p=ggplot(data_d, aes(sg_d)) + geom_bar()plot(p) node betweenness12345678910V(gg)$bte = betweenness(gg, directed = F)## png("net_betweenness.png", width = 500, height = 500)par(mar = c(0, 2, 0, 0))#plot(V(gg)$bte,xlab="index",ylab="betweenness",col="green")## dev.off()data_v=data.frame(index=1:length(V(gg)),betweenness=V(gg)$bte)p = ggplot(data_v,aes(x=index,y=betweenness,colour="index")) +geom_point(size=3) + # geom_text(aes(label = index,vjust = -0.8, hjust = 0.5), show.legend = FALSE)#p=ggplot(data_d, aes(sg_d)) + geom_bar()plot(p) 1234567V(gg)$size = 5V(gg)[bte>=150]$size = 15#V(gg)$label=NA#V(gg)[bte>=150]$label=V(gg)[bte>=150]$name#V(gg)[bte>=150]$labelV(gg)$cex=1V(gg)[bte>=150]$cex=2 123456789## png("net_walktrap_betweenness.png", width = 500, height = 500)par(mar = c(0, 0, 0, 0))set.seed(14)plot(gg, layout = layout.fruchterman.reingold, vertex.size = V(gg)$size, vertex.color = V(gg)$color, vertex.label = V(gg)$label, vertex.label.cex=V(gg)$cex, edge.color = grey(0.5), edge.arrow.mode = "-")## dev.off()V(gg)[bte>=150]$label 'BrighamYoung' 'CentralMichigan' 'LouisianaTech' 'NewMexicoState' 'Navy' 'NotreDame' 'Cincinnati' a sample of recommendation12neighbors(gg,V(gg)$label=="BrighamYoung")V(gg)[5]$label + 12/115 vertices: [1] 2 5 10 17 24 34 36 42 66 91 94 105 'NewMexico' 123#hashmap instead#map=c()#names(map)=c() based on betweenness12345678910111213141516171819#neighbors(gg,V(gg)$label=="BrighamYoung",mode = c("out", "in", "all", "total"))#tmp = neighbors(gg,V(gg)$label=="BrighamYoung") %in% neighbors(gg,V(gg)$label=="NewMexico")#tmp#tmp1 = setdiff(neighbors(gg,V(gg)$label=="BrighamYoung") , neighbors(gg,V(gg)$label=="NewMexico"))tmp1 = setdiff(V(gg),neighbors(gg,V(gg)$label=="NewMexico"))tmp1_bte=V(gg)[tmp1]$bte#t=table(tmp1_bte,names=tmp1)#tt=tmp1_btenames(t)=tmp1listall = sort(t, dec = T)top = listall[1:length(t)]#top#names(which(t[1,]==1))t1 = top[1:5]t1_names=V(gg)[as.integer(names(t1))]$labelnames(t1)=t1_names#t1[as.character(top[1])]t1 NotreDame 215.98577427622 Navy 187.826344074865 LouisianaTech 185.647805653186 CentralMichigan 162.228191494366 Cincinnati 153.529962162747 based on common friends123456789101112131415161718192021# NewMexico好友t_n=neighbors(gg,V(gg)$label=="NewMexico")# 非好友t_nn=setdiff(V(gg),t_n)t_nn=t_nn[-which(t_nn==5)]# 共同好友计算t_nn_ld=c()t_nn_=c()i=0for(t_ in t_nn){ d=sum(neighbors(gg,t_) %in% t_n) if(d>=1){ i=i+1 t_nn_ld[i]=d t_nn_[i]=t_ }else{ }}t_nn_linkdegree_dic=t_nn_ldnames(t_nn_linkdegree_dic)=t_nn_ 12345t_nn_ld_=sort(t_nn_linkdegree_dic,dec=T)if(length(t_nn_ld_)>=5){ t_nn_ld_=t_nn_ld_[1:5]}#t_nn_ld_ 12print("rec :")t_nn_ld_ [1] "rec :" 91 5 12 4 23 3 68 3 79 3 12345print("names :")for (i in (1:length(t_nn_ld_))){ t_nn_ld_[i]=V(gg)[as.integer(names(t_nn_ld_[i]))]$label}t_nn_ld_ [1] "names :" 91 'UtahState' 12 'NorthTexas' 23 'Arizona' 68 'Nevada' 79 'WashingtonState' Referencehttp://cos.name/2011/04/exploring-renren-social-network/

entry.title: Windows7 + ArchLinux xfce 双系统教程
entry.content: Windows7 + ArchLinux xfce 双系统教程准备Archlinux官网下载admincd镜像 http://www.archlinux.org/ rufus刻录入U盘 https://rufus.akeo.ie/ Windows 压缩卷压缩空闲空间（linux安装空间）Windows U盘启动进入archlinux安装盘 安装基本系统查看分区信息1fdisk -l 分区1cfdisk 选择free space，new创建archlinux分区，参考: 盘符 内容 大小 类型 说明 dev/sdaX /boot 200M(1G) 83 linux 引导区 dev/sdaX+1 /swap >=内存 82 swap 交换分区 dev/sdaX+2 / 50% of FreeSpace - dev/sdaX - dev/sdaX+1 83 linux 根分区 dev/sdaX+3 /home 50% of FreeSpace 83 linux 用户目录 write写入 格式化1234mkfs.ext4 /dev/sdaXmkswap /dev/sdaX+1mkfs.ext4 /dev/sdaX+2mkfs.ext4 /dev/sdaX+3 挂载123456mount /dev/sdaX+2 /mntmkdir /mnt/bootmount /dev/sdaX /mnt/bootswapon /dev/sdaX+1mkdir /mnt/homemount /dev/sdaX+3 /mnt/home 配置pacman源(163)1nano -w /etc/pacman Ctrl+O保存 Ctrl+X退出 首行添加 ## Score = 0.1 ChinaServer = http://mirrors.163.com/archlinux/$repo/os/$arch 连接网络(有线参考官方wiki)12wifi-menupacman -Syy(更新本地库和软件，不更新软件使用-Sy) 安装基本系统1pacstrap -i /mnt base base-devel net-tools dialog 生成fstab123genfstab -U -p /mnt >> /mnt/etc/fstabchrootarch-chroot /mnt /bin/bash 配置语言123nano -w /etc/locale.gen(开启zh_CN全部编码、en_US.UTF-8)locale.genecho LANG=en_US.UTF-8 >> /etc/locale.conf 设置vconsole（可选）1nano -w /etc/vconsole.conf 添加 KEYMAP=usFONT= 时间查看(时间修改应和windows7保持一致，一般不需要修改)1date 设置主机名12echo 主机名 > /etc/hostnamenano -w /etc/hosts localhost后添加 主机名 例 127.0.0.1 localhost.localdomain localhost 主机名::1 localhost.localdomain localhost 主机名 生成初始ramdisk环境1mkinitcpio -p linux 修改root密码1passwd 创建普通用户12useradd -m -g users -G wheel,video,audio -s /bin/bash 用户名passwd 用户名 安装启动器1pacman -S grub-bios 安装grub至boot分区1234chattr -i /boot/grub/i386-pc/core.imggrub-install --target=i386-pc --debug --force /dev/sdaX(/boot所在分区)chattr +i /boot/grub/i386-pc/core.imggrub-mkconfig -o /boot/grub/grub.cfg 重启12345exitumount /mnt/bootumount /mnt/homeumount /mntreboot 弹出U盘进入windows windows引导archlinux安装easybcd(或grub4dos)点击Add New Entry，选择NeoGrub，点击Install，点击Configure添加内容: default 0timeout 1 title Chainload into GRUB v2root (hd0,Y)chainloader +1boot 此处hd0为第一块硬盘，第二块hd1。Y表示分区号，主分区分别用(hd0m0)~(hd0,3)表示，逻辑分区从(hd0,4)开始，第一逻辑分区(hd0,4),第二逻辑分区(hd0,5)，以此类推。一般情况c盘用(hd0,0),D盘用(hd0,5)。光盘用(cd)表示，第一软驱用(fd0)表示。可参照下表, 盘符 C: D: E: F: G: 表示 (hd0,0) (hd0,4) (hd0,5) (hd0,6) (hd0,7) 保存后(Advanced Settings可修改选项名称，Save Settings保存)重启 引导原理：windows bcd添加grub引导项，grub引导archlinux的grub启动archlinux系统。（链式引导 chainloader） 选择第二项进入archlinux 安装桌面环境连接网络(有线参考官方wiki)1wifi-menu 安装驱动123pacman -S alsa-utils(声卡)pacman -S mesa xf86-video-intel(intel显卡,A卡:xf86-video-ati，N卡：xf86-video-nouveau)pacman -S xf86-input-synaptics(触摸板) 安装xorg12pacman -S xorg xorg-twm xorg-xinit xtermstartx测试，启动界面(成功)，exit退出 安装xfce412pacman -s xfce4 (默认全部)nano -w ~/.xinitrc 添加 exec startxfce4 添加执行权限12chmod +x ~/.xinitrcstartx可启动桌面环境 登陆管理器lightdm或sddm(可选,配置参考官方wiki)Aur可使用yaourt(可选) 安装终端1pacman -S xfce4-terminal 安装网络管理12pacman -S networkmanagerststemctl enable networkmanager 中文字体1pacman -S wqy-zenhei wqy-microhei ttf-arphic-ukai ttf-arphic-uming wqy-bitmapfont opendesktop-uming(一种或多种) 输入法ibus-rime(或fcitx)12pacman -S ibus-rimenano -w ~/.xprofile 添加 export GTK_IM_MODULE=ibusexport QT_IM_MODULE=ibusexport XMODIFIERS=@im=ibus 安装解压1pacman -S unrar unzip p7zip 其他Applicationshttps://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/List_of_applicationshttp://packages.archlinux.org 完成 Reference 1.Archlinux installation guidehttp://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Installation_guide 2.Archlinux wikihttp://wiki.archlinux.org/ 3.Archlinux 安装教程http://blog.lucode.net/linux/archlinux-install-tutorial.html 4.Archlinux 2015.07.01 和 Windows7 双系统 安装教程http://www.cnblogs.com/fangying7/p/3803290.html 5.Windows7与arch-linux双系统安装方法http://m.blog.csdn.net/article/details?id=11377195 6.Win7 添加grub引导Linux最简单方法http://m.blog.chinaunix.net/uid-14735472-id-2845735.html 7.Grub4dos教程http://wk.baidu.com/view/fc83026aaf1ffc4ffe47acb9#1
